posts.post_content:
Selling the following back stamps from my collection.  Also willing to trade for different stamp backs (names, cool symbols, etc...)



Clyde Engle - Sweet Caporal - Roy W. Babcock Stamp - SOLD

Red Kleinow (New York, with bat) - Piedmont - Roy Babcock Stamp - $25

Bugs Raymond - Sweet Caporal - Roy Babcock Stamp - $25

Red Ames (Portrait) - Piedmont - Roy Babcock Stamp - $30

Frank LaPorte - Sweet Caporal - Roy Babcock Stamp - $25

Neal Ball (New York) - Sweet Caporal - Roy Babcock Stamp - SOLD

Dode Criss - Sweet Caporal - Pencil Script - SOLD

Frank Isbell - Piedmont - Pencil Script - SOLD

Fred Burchell - Piedmont - "Charles" Stamp - SOLD

Bill Clancy - Piedmont - "Charles" Stamp - SOLD

Jack Hannifan - Piedmont - "Manager" Stamp - SOLD

Rube Dessau - Polar Bear - PSA 2 (MK) - Unknown Stamp - SOLD 



"I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.  Offers welcome.

Add $5 for shipping. Free shipping on purchases of multiple cards. Prices are net.  ppff or check/money order accepted.

Isabell sold

Sent from my SM-N960U using Tapatalk
IM sent for Engle and Burchell
Lowered prices on all remaining cards.

I’ll take Hannifan.
